      • substitution

        public java.lang.String substitution(char chrp_target,
                                     char chrp_replace,
                                     java.lang.String strp_sentence)
        Description copied from interface: EncryptTool
        String mutator, loops through a given string and replaces all target characters with the replacement character. Changes one character at a time.
        Specified by:
        substitution in interface EncryptTool
        Parameters:
        chrp_target - Target character, character to be replaced.
        chrp_replace - Replacement character, replaces all target characters.
        strp_sentence - Given string, will have all targets replaced with designated character.
        Returns:
        Mutated string that has all target characters replaced.

      • shift

        public java.lang.String shift(int intp_shift,

        Description copied from interface: EncryptTool
        String mutator, shifts the ENTIRE string by a given number of characters in the ASCII character set.
        Specified by:
        shift in interface EncryptTool
        Parameters:
        intp_shift - Integer amount that you wish to shift the string by.
        Returns:
        Mutated string that has been shifted by the given amount.
